entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
